Your company places a high priority on the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of sensitive patient information. We follow strict security protocols and standards, including data encryption methods and access controls, as well as incident response plans. The data encryption methods we use include Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols. We also implement role-based access controls and regularly update our systems to prevent unauthorized access.
